AddOption.description:
DMENU [Client] Add an option to the DMenu

[string] name
  Name of the option.

[function] func=nil
  Function to execute when this option is clicked.

AddSubMenu.description:
DMENU [Client] Add a sub menu to the DMenu

[string] Name
  Name of the sub menu.

[function] func=nil
  Function to execute when this sub menu is clicked.

GetChild.description:
DMENU [Client] 

[number] childIndex
  The index of the child to get.

Open.description:
DMENU [Client] Opens the DMenu at the current mouse position

[number] x=gui.MouseX()
  Position (X coordinate) to open the menu at.

[number] y=gui.MouseY()
  Position (Y coordinate) to open the menu at.

[any] skipanimation
  This argument does nothing.

[Panel] ownerpanel
